name: Idexx Laboratories
description: IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. develops, manufactures, and distributes products for the companion animal veterinary, livestock and poultry, dairy, and water testing industries in the United States and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Companion Animal Group; Water Quality Products; and Livestock, Poultry and Dairy. It offers in-clinic chemistry, blood and urine chemistry, hematology, immunoassay, urinalysis, cytology, and coagulation analyzers; and SNAP rapid assays test kits.
